examples.example: 我们要将全部的热情投入到工作中，努力创造更美好的未来。

translate.english: We should devote all our enthusiasm to the work and strive to create a better future.

examples.example: 他把全部精力都放在了提升自己的专业能力上。

translate.english: He put all his energy into improving his professional ability.

examples.example: 他用全部的爱去呵护家人，让家庭充满温暖与幸福。

translate.english: He uses all his love to care for his family, making the family full of warmth and happiness.
